sub_title: Administrative Assistant / Personal Assistant / Executive Secretary/ Costumer Service/Assistant/ Receptionist
summary: 15 years of experience working as Executive Secretary for the Government & Publicity industry. Assisting external investors, government executives and suppliers by providing advice on service and products, while managing relationships and taking over calls when needed. Skilled in Customer Care, Budget Control & Planning, Performance Manager, Administrative Task, and Operational Services. Strong Office Manager, with an MBA in Public Administration (UNOPAR University- Brazil), Master in Cuisine and Gastronomy (Escuela de Fomento Profissional- Spain), bachelor’s degree in Tourism (UNI Anhanguera University - Brazil), and Specialized in Customer Service (Fundação Pró-Cerrado - Brazil). Fluent in Portuguese, English, and Spanish. Currently studying Dutch. Focus on operations and administrative tasks, to ensure customer needs and requirements are met. Responsible for financial and clerical duties, as well as managing monthly/annual results, performance reports, handing agenda/phone calls, and optimizing procedures. Creating new opportunities for existing and new customers, tracking project metrics, identifying improvements, and best practices for a diverse range of industries.

education.field_of_study: Tourism and Travel Services Marketing Operations

profile_positions.description:
• Preparing foods of the highest caliber that can be refrigerated for expats in the Netherlands.
• Follow standard recipes and minimize waste to help ensure that the food cost is in line with budget.
• Having an in-depth knowledge all food items on the menu offered to the customer.
• Ensure all dishes are correctly presented and garnished before leaving the customer house.
• Establishing cleanliness and hygiene, watching for proper equipment and utensil handling, maintenance, and usage.
• Managing multiple or complex calendars to serve all customers needs.
profile_positions.title: Personal Chef

profile_positions.company: Assembleia Legislativa do Estado do Tocantins
profile_positions.description:
• Maintaining executive’s agenda from the Tax Authorities Office and assist in planning appointments, board meetings,

conferences, and others.
• Attend meetings and keep minutes in an organized matter.
• Receiving phone calls and redirecting them when appropriate to the team members.
• Handle packages delivery, outgoing or incoming correspondence (e-mail, letters, packages etc.).
• Make travel arrangements for executives as well as book meeting rooms.
• Attending events, preparing confidential documents ensuring they remain secure and on the system.
profile_positions.title: Executive Secretary

company.name: Secretary of Youth and Sports of the State of Tocantins

profile_positions.company: Secretary of Youth and Sports of the State of Tocantins
profile_positions.description:
• Offering great expertise as the Secretary of Cabinet, Executive Assistant, and Administrative Coordinator of
the Election Campaign.
• Manage customer service, secretariat, and events.
• Answering client inquiries, ordering office supplies, and providing direct advice to the Superintendency.
• Prepare spreadsheets, financial reports, and general memorandum.
• Receive shipments, check stocks, and make travel arrangements for executives.
• Working closely with other team members to provide outstanding service.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant
